title: Gas.Guzzlers.Extreme.DX11-PROPHET
description:
Gas Guzzlers Extreme *DX11* (c) Iceberg Interactive

release date ...: July 2769
protection .....: Steam
# of discs .....: 1
languages ......: EN/FR/DE/IT/ES/PL/RU/PT-BR/HU/HR/UK

Gas  Guzzlers   Extreme   is   a   fast,   furious,
armed-to-the-teeth, trigger-happy shooter,  shifted
into top gear! Take a white knuckle  ride  in  this
crazily addictive combat racing game that  features
a ton  of  vehicles,  weapons,  upgrades,  on-track
bonuses and environments. Gas Guzzlers  Extreme  is
an exciting new twist on the car combat  experience
with  the  addition  of  furious  team/clan  combat
battles. Players start  out  with  low  performance
vehicles  and   soon   work   their   way   up   to
high-performance models,  by  earning  money  in  a
series of hi-octane races and  arena  battles.  New
game modes, tracks and  vehicles  are  unlocked  as
players  progress  through  the  game.  Along  with
developing  their  driving  and  fighting   skills,
players   can   spend   their   hard-fought   cash,
customizing  their  vehicle  to  match  their  clan
members or pimping  their  ride  for  the  road  to
glory!

This release also includes all released DLCs:

* Full Metal Frenzy DLC
* Full Metal Zombie DLC

1- Unpack, burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the cracked content from PROPHET dir
4- Go To Hell!

NOTE:
This version supports DirectX 11 (DirectX 9  is  no
longer supported). This mean most of the files have
changed  which  results  in  (apart   of   improved
graphics) smaller game size and much faster loading
times. Game is also updated to v1.8.0.0.

NOTE 2:
If you have played this game before and it doesn't
launch with the language selected during the
installation, go to:
DocumentsGamepiresGasGuzzlersExtreme
and delete the GasGuzzlers.xml file
